markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dero Magister](/Monsters.aspx?ID=107)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Dero magisters are leaders among dero society. They perform the bulk of the cruel operations and memory-altering procedures inflicted upon their victims.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Dero_DeroMagister.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Dero Magister](/Monsters.aspx?ID=107)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Dero" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=214" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +12, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +8, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[Aklys](/Weapons.aspx?ID=85)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 65

**Immunities**
[confusion](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5)

**Weaknesses**
vulnerable to sunlight

**Vulnerable to Sunlight** A dero magister takes 10 damage for every hour they're exposed to sunlight.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
aklys +10 ([Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
aklys +13 ([Ranged Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=251), [Tethered](/Traits.aspx?ID=252), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 24
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292)
- **4th**
[Modify Memory](/Spells.aspx?ID=200)

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 24
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214), [Spectral Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=295), [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (3 slots)

**Cytillesh Stare** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The magister focuses their gaze on a creature they can see within 30 feet. The target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round and must succeed at a DC 24 Will saving throw or be [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 round.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-29" />
name: Dero Magister
